name: KMeans
description: Performs KMeans clustering on the first input data provided. The output consists of the original input with a Cluster field appended. If a second input is available, it will be used as output instead.
introductoryText:
Performs KMeans clustering on the first input data provided.
The output consists of the original input with a Cluster field appended. If a second input is available, it will be used as output instead.

options.name: useAllNumericFields
options.title: Use all numeric fields
options.description: If set to true, fields.to.use will be ignored and instead all numeric data fields used

options.name: fieldsToUse
options.title: Fields to use
options.description: Adjust to represent the fields you want to cluster on
